todos.title: Nelson Mandela
todos.note: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

todos.title: Walt Disney
todos.note: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

todos.title: Steve Jobs
todos.note: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

todos.title: Eleanor Roosevelt
todos.note: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
